description: Try our easy to follow No-Bake Dark Chocolate & Date Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: No-Bake Dark Chocolate & Date Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line base and sides of an 18.5cm square pan with baking paper. Process biscuit, butter and 1 tbs syrup in a food processor until biscuit is finely chopped and combined. Line base of pan with mixture, using back of a spoon to flatten. Chill.
Process dates, spread, oil, vanilla, remaining syrup and 1/4 cup boiled water in a food processor until smooth. Pour mixture over biscuit base. Freeze for 30 minutes or until firm.
Place chocolate and cream in a heatproof bowl set over a saucepan of simmering water (ensuring bowl doesnâ€™t touch water) and stir until melted and combined.

Pour chocolate mixture over date layer, spreading evenly with a palette knife or back of a spoon. Scatter over salt flakes and freeze for 3 hours or until firm. Use a hot knife to cut slice into 20 pieces, then store in the freezer until ready to serve.
